title: Yamenutome Ʋuʋu - Orbital Gbedoxɔ
heading: Yamenutome Ʋuʋu
intro: Woɖoe be woaɖe Orbital Gbedoxɔa ɖe PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) me le November 28th, 2025 dzi tso Satish Dhawan Yamenutome Dɔwɔƒe le Sriharikota, India.
partnership: Orbital Temple ƒe dodo nye hadomeɖoɖo si le NewSpace India Limited (NSIL), si nye India Dziɖuɖua ƒe Dɔwɔƒe si le Yamenutome Dɔwɔƒe, Antrix Corporation te, kple nutala la dome. Nuwɔwɔ aduadu sia tsi tre ɖi na nu vevi aɖe na aɖaŋudɔwo le yamenutome didi me, si ƒo India ƒe yamenutomeyimɔ̃ ƒe ɖoɖoa nu ƒu kple aɖaŋudɔwɔwɔ ƒe ŋutega si nye be woaxɔ amewo katã ɖe eme vevie.

risks.heading: Afɔku siwo le eme
risks.paragraph1: Wowɔ satelait la be wòate ŋu ado dzi le ʋuʋudedi ƒe nɔnɔme sesẽwo kple dzoxɔxɔ ƒe tsatsam me, eye wodoe kpɔ vevie. Gake yamenutomeyimɔ̃wo hea afɔku siwo le dzɔdzɔme nu vɛ. Ne satelait la gblẽ le eɖoɖo alo eɖoɖo me, alo ne mete ŋu ɖo kadodo kple míaƒe anyigbadzidɔwɔƒewo o la, míawɔ dɔ akpɔ kuxi ɖesiaɖe gbɔ ahakpɔ egbɔ. Satelait la ƒe ɖoɖo siwo mehiã o kple backup protocol siwo ŋu wotrɔ asi le be woana mɔnukpɔkpɔ si li be dɔdasi nakpɔ dzidzedze geɖe wu la le esi.
risks.paragraph2: Tsɔ kpe ɖe eŋu la, satelait la ate ŋu anɔ ɣletinyigba dzi ƒe 10 kple edzivɔ ne yame ƒe nɔnɔme alo nu bubuwo na ɣletinyigba la gblẽ do ŋgɔ. Togbɔ be míewɔe be wòanɔ anyi ƒe ewo ya teti hã la, agbenɔƒe ŋutɔŋutɔ nɔ te ɖe nɔnɔme siwo dzi míate ŋu aɖu bliboe o dzi.
risks.paragraph3: Ne gbãtɔa dodo do kpo nu, alo ne míete ŋu wɔ dɔdasi sia abe alesi míeɖoe ene o la, míadzro mɔ bubu siwo dzi míato ayi ŋgɔe me, si ate ŋu anye be míadze egɔme zi evelia kple gazazã si li, hadomedɔwɔwɔ kple dɔdasi bubuwo, alo agbagbadzedzea ŋuti nuŋlɔɖiwo wɔwɔ abe nutata la ƒe ŋutinya si ku ɖe didi kple seɖoƒe ŋu ƒe akpa aɖe ene.
